name: Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Holiday Hare '98
description:
Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Holiday Hare '98 is an arcade game developed by Epic MegaGames and Orange Games. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by Gathering of Developers. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Holiday Hare '98 is available on PC.
